PageInfo.Message:
In the <COL ffdc78>Epitaph Road: Heroic Spirit
Sleeping Path</COL>,
you can unlock the <COL ffdc78>Special Skill
Augmentation</COL> that has been sealed.
However, in order to do so, you need to challenge
the trials inscribed on the gravestones in a place
called <COL ffdc78>The Realm of Heroic
Spirits</COL> and achieve special conditions to
defeat the enemy.

Furthermore, in order to venture further into the
depths of the Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path and
remove the debris, you must harness the power of
the Heroic Spirits and engage in <COL
ffdc78>"Large-Scale Development"</COL>.
Large-Scale Development is a power that is
liberated by borrowing the strength of the Heroic
Spirit NPCs.

However, there are also places where "Small-scale
Development" can remove the soil without borrowing
the power of the heroic spirit.
When conducting small-scale development, the soil
is immediately removed, and a path to obtain more
rewards such as Crests will be open.
By developing all paths, you will be able to
obtain the divine protection of the heroic spirit.

*You can only enter the Epitaph Road if all party
members are present.
If one person exits the dungeon you will not be
able to start the trials or re-enter the dungeon,
you will have to re-enter with the whole party
again.
